attributes.action: Create a regular direct bus route from York to Darlington
attributes.additional_details:
A bus route from York to Darlington should be created for employment and leisure reasons.
Train fares are expensive, between York and Darlington and even though Darlington is in a different county, it borders North Yorkshire where York is.
North Yorkshire lacks a Sunday service, so it would also be beneficial to have a Sunday service on that route, also.
